Above: How much of the requirements were covered on the most recent Graphwalker run.

GraphWalker

GraphWalker is an open-source Model-Based testing tool. It reads models in the shape of directed graphs, and generates test paths from these graphs.

Requirements

Requirements are a collection of conditions or capabilities needed by a user to solve a problem or achieve an objective.
